quote_first: "Good evening, Mrs. Scheindlin," the man said before departing. "Good evening, Chris. Say hello to the wife for me." "I sure will. Thanks. Bye," he said, waving to Elliot, who returned the goodbye. It was
quote_last: when Elliot rested the handset in its cradle.
title: Comrades in Miami: A Novel
